Doing business with us is easy and straightforward.  Follow these steps to get started.

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_color=”#f7f7f7″ custom_padding_tablet=”50px|0|50px|0″ custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” padding_mobile=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ padding_mobile=”off” column_padding_mobile=”on” admin_label=”row” module_id=”request-utilities-quote” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_custom_width=”on”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25.4″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”APPLY FOR A QUOTE” image=”https://multiutilityuk.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/1-1.png” admin_label=”Blurb” module_class=”blurb” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_font_size=”24″ body_font_size=”16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px” animation=”off” custom_css_main_element=”border-right: 1px solid #e6e6e6;” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

 

Complete the form below, providing us with as much information as you can. We’ll then apply for Points of the connections with the relevant authorities and complete draft designs to enable us to provide you with a detailed quote. It’s that simple.

 Timescale 6 – 8 weeks

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”WELCOME PACK” url=”http://www.klaros.co.uk/quick-pricing/” image=”https://multiutilityuk.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/2-1.png” admin_label=”Blurb” module_class=”blurb” _builder_version=”3.25.4″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_font_size=”24″ body_font_size=”16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px” animation=”off” custom_css_main_element=”border-left: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);||border-right: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0);” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

 

Work with us and you will receive a detailed Welcome Pack to help ensure we work seamlessly alongside your team. It lays out how we’ll work together and seeks information that will help us submit the correct designs for approval to the relevant authorities.

Timescale 4 – 6 weeks 

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb title=”ON SITE ” url=”http://www.klaros.co.uk/contact/” image=”https://multiutilityuk.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/3-1.png” admin_label=”Blurb” module_class=”blurb” _builder_version=”4.9.1″ header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_font_size=”24″ body_font_size=”16″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px” animation=”off” custom_css_main_element=”border-left: 1px solid #e6e6e6;” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

 

All clients enjoy the benefit of a nominated experienced Utility Co-ordinator.

They will be happy to guide you through the various steps required to help us get your project underway, on time.

Timescale 4 – 6 weeks

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.9.1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”60px|60px|60px|60px”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″]

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.1″ module_alignment=”left”]

GET IN TOUCH

 

Green Lane
Heywood
Lancashire
England
OL10 2EW

T: 01706 367123
E: info@multiutilityuk.com
